title: Jennifer Aniston and former Friends co-star Reese Witherspoon reunite
text:
Two screen legends joined forces on Thursday evening as Jennifer Aniston and Reese Witherspoon discussed their new Apple TV+ show in Los Angeles.

The former Friends co-stars took centre stage at a Hollywood Reporter panel discussion on behalf of forthcoming drama The Morning Show.

Making an entrance at the special event, Jennifer, 50, caught the eye in a stylish black belted blazer and matching skinny jeans.

Side by side: Two screen legends joined forces on Thursday evening as Jennifer Aniston and Reese Witherspoon discussed their new Apple TV+ show in Los Angeles

The actress added to her look with a pair of black leather ankle boots, while her brunette hair was neatly styled with a simple centre-parting.

Joining her co-star, Reese was an engaging sight in a breezy black prairie top and on-trend boot-cut jeans.

The Oscar winning actress, 43, completed her look with a pair of black suede boots, while limited accessories ensured her understated outfit was not overshadowed.

Looking good: Jennifer, 50, caught the eye in a stylish black belted blouse and matching skinny jeans after taking to the stage at the special event

Pals: The actress held hands with co-star Reese as they fielded questions in Los Angels on Thursday

Tasteful: Reese opted for a breezy black prairie top during her latest promotional commitment on behalf of The Morning Show

The pair, who first worker together on Friends in 2000, were in high spirits as they took to the stage alongside event moderator Alison Brower, Deputy Editorial Director at The Hollywood Reporter.

With a two-season deal and a sizeable budget of $15 million per episode, The Morning Show is the forthcoming Apple TV+ streaming service's centerpiece - not least because of its stellar cast.

The show, which focuses on the fallout from a sexual misconduct scandal at a pioneering TV station, also features Steve Carrell, Billy Crudup and Gugu Mbatha-Raw.

In good company: The pair were joined by event moderator Alison Brower, Deputy Editorial Director at The Hollywood Reporter

Say cheese: Deanna Brown, President of Billboard-Hollywood Reporter Media Group, also joined the actresses for a photo on Thursday evening

Both Jennifer and Reese feature as executive producers on the drama, which will launch on November 1.

The actresses first met on the set of Friends almost twenty years ago, with Reese playing Rachel Green's demanding screen sister Jill over two episodes.

Taking to Instagram on Thursday, Jennifer paid tribute to their time together on the iconic sit-com, by sharing a clip from episode The One With Rachel's Sister.

Let's talk: Jennifer listened intently as moderator Alison directed a question at the co-stars

Busy girls: The actress co-produced The Morning Show with old friend Reese

Ambitious: With a two-season deal and a sizeable budget of $15 million per episode, The Morning Show is the forthcoming Apple TV+ streaming service's centerpiece

The clip starts with an infuriated Rachel, played by Aniston, who shouts at her sister Jill, played by Witherspoon: 'This is about you being a brat, wanting what you can't have.'

'Can't have? Excuse me, the only thing I can't have is dairy!' Reese retorts.

The clip comes as Jennifer joined Instagram for the first time less than a week ago. She reached one million followers in just 45 minutes and has received over million likes on each post.

Old times: Reese featured alongside Jennifer in two episodes of Friends
description: The celebrated actresses took centre stage  at a Hollywood Reporter panel discussion on behalf of forthcoming drama The Morning Show.
